titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale School of Drama Records of the Dean
Yale School of Drama Records of the Dean
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:10

did.unittitle: Yale School of Drama records of the dean

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, printed materials, speeches, committee files, reports, scripts, theses, and budgets documenting the activities of the dean of the Yale School of Drama. Included are records of Deans Robert Brustein, Howard Stein, and Lloyd Richards.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 22-A (YRG 22-A), Central records and records of the dean of the Yale School of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale School of Drama Records of the Dean (RU 727). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, printed materials, speeches, committee files, reports, scripts, theses, and budgets documenting the activities of the dean of the Yale School of Drama. Included are records of Deans Robert Brustein, Howard Stein, and Lloyd Richards.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted until Jan 1, 2018

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred to MSSA by the Beinecke from the Lloyd Richards papers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are listed alphabetically by folder title.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records of the Dean contained in boxes 1 and 2 are restricted until January 1, 2037 due to University policy set by the Yale Corporation. Records of the Dean contained in Box 3 is restricted until January 1, 2067 due to the same University policy.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials are restricted until January 1, 2037 due to University policy.
